weekly picks (Dec 1 week 2024)

Posted on December 2, 2024 in 2024dec,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Dec 1st week collection

  1. rs-3856814 Observation of switchable polar skyrmion bubbles down to the atomic layers in van der Waals ferroelectric CuInP2S6 (researchsquare)

  2. 1674-1056/ad9892 Strain-manipulated dispersion characteristics of magnonic crystals with DMI and applications on spin-wave devices (Chinese Physics B)

  3. 2053-1583/ad9842 Flat Bands without Twists through the use of One Harmonic Moir’e Systems: Topological Nature of Modes and Electron-Electron Pairing in Periodic Uniaxial Strained or Crenellated Graphene Nanoribbons (2D Materials)

  4. 2411.17815 Localized obstructed pairs with zero superfluid stiffness from doping an antiferromagnetic insulator (arXiv)

  5. s42005-024-01876-3 Flat dispersion at large momentum transfer at the onset of exciton polariton formation (Communications physics)

  6. 2411.18332 Stability and Dynamics of Skyrmion and Skyrmion Bags Explored under the Influence of Out-of-Plane Strain and Its Gradient (arXiv)

  7. 2411.18017 Topological Momentum Skyrmions in Mie Scattering Fields (arXiv)

  8. apxr.202400107 Anatomy of the Dynamics of the Nucleation of Skyrmions in Nanodots via the Voltage-Controlled Magnetic Anisotropy (Advanced Physics Research)

  9. 2411.17208 Manipulation of topology by electric field in breathing kagome lattice (arXiv)

  10. 2411.17092 Evolution of flat bands in two-dimensional fused pentagon network (arXiv)

  11. 2411.15304 Thermal Hall response of an abelian chiral spin liquid at finite temperatures (arXiv)

  12. adma.202411733 Observation of Highly Spin-Polarized Dangling Bond Surface States in Rare-Earth Pnictide Tellurides (Advanced Materials)

  13. 2411.16188 Typical altermagnetism with huge nonrelativistic spin-split and flat band in the bulk CoF2 (arXiv)

  14. s41535-024-00704-9 Multinode quantum spin liquids in extended Kitaev honeycomb models (npj QMs)

  15. 2411.16395 Switchable Skyrmion-Antiskyrmion Tubes in Rhombohedral BaTiO3 and Related Materials (arXiv)

  16. acs.nanolett.4c04527 Three-Dimensional Multiorbital Flat Band Models and Materials (Nano Letters)

  17. 1361-648X/ad9723 Porous Haldane model: Topological phase transitions and flat bands (JPCM)

  18. adfm.202415606 Rectangular Carbon Nitrides C4N Monolayers with a Zigzag Buckled Structure: Quasi-1D Dirac Nodal Lines and Weak Topological Properties with Flat Edge States (Advanced functional materials)

  19. 1361-6528/ad96c2 Magnetic domain wall and skyrmion manipulation by static and dynamic strain profiles (Nanotechnology)

  20. s41467-024-54521-6 Reducing crystal symmetry to generate out-of-plane Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction (Nature communications)
